targets.query: SELECT mean("pods-cpu-sum") FROM "functions_usage_table" WHERE ("cluster_name" =~ /^$cluster_name$/ AND "function_name" =~ /^$function_name$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "cluster_name" fill(null)
